topics.body:
God this is horrible

I can't eat, i'm constantly sleepy and tired, i have this weird feeling of pressure in my head and genrally just feel very very strange. 

!http://www.newjerseyhunter.com/forums/attachments/789d1363200673-got-my-fox-mount-back-full-fox.jpg!
topics.author: 5007bbdf7f123b112f00023a

topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54de38b06368725489c80800#post_54de38b06368725489c80800
But I just woke up a while ago. Didn't sleep much though.

Gonna try to eat something. Should help a bit. Worst thing is, this is gonna last at least a few more days i think. [spoiler]I upped my dose of antidepressants you see. I had similar symptoms for a while when i started taking them and now they're back.[/spoiler]
topics.author: 5007bbdf7f123b112f00023a
